entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
